REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1342 reute r f BC-THERMO-PROCESS-<TPSI> 03-26 0055

TEXT.TITLE: THERMO PROCESS <TPSI> COMPLETES ACQUSITION
TEXT.BODY: Thermo Process Systems Inc said it completed its purchase of Thermo Process Services Inc, a subsidiary of Thermo Electron Corp <TMO>. Thermo Process Systems said it issued 2,590,000 shares of its common stock to Thermo Electron in connection with the sale. Reuter
